!Hierarch Kekropus: You must meet the last of the 3 great Spicula heroes, Rodenpicula. Unlike the others, she has a deep relationship with you Metusela Kamael... She will be able to tell you about the limitations you feel right now... She is in the heart of the island, *Nornil's Garden.* But first, you must seek out Mao, who is the *head manager of Nornil's Garden.*
